Translations.Text: Qui like would loan DEUS loan righteousness it multiplied eum manifold finis generous recompense

Feria advenit when vos vide believing vir femina their lights radiating ahead de them to their statim. Bonus news est yours ut feria vos habet gardens flowing streams Vos abide therein forever Hoc est major triumph
Feria hypocrite vir femina dictus to those believed Please allow nos absorb some de tuus light It dictus Iit vos seek light barrier set them gate separates mercy inner side retribution outer side
They alias them Est nos non vos? They answer Sic vos cheated tuus anima hesitated doubted became misled wishful thinking deus judgment advenit! Vos diverted ex DEUS illusions
Ergo hodie non ransom taken vos nor ex those disbelieved Tuus abode est fire it est tuus dominus miserable abode

it est temporis those believed open up their hearts deus message truth revealed hic? They non est followers proximus scriptures hearts became hardened temporis consequently multus de them turned wicked
Know ut DEUS revives terra it abiit! Nos sic explain revelations vos vos understand
Surely charitable vir femina loaned DEUS loan goodness. They receive their reward multiplied manifold they deserved generous recompense
Those believed in DEUS His messengers est saints martyrs Reserved them their Dominus est their rewards their light Prout pro those disbelieved rejected noster revelations they incurred Hell
